title: Leveraging molybdenum sulfur compounds as catalysts for the synthesis of biobased poly(ethylene 2,5-furandicarboxylate) and recycling
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00474D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dmitrii Razinkov, Beatriz Agostinho, Sigridur G. Suman, Andreia F. Sousa
Two safe dinuclear Mo complexes with non-rigid bidentate phosphinoyldithio formate ligands, differing in phosphorus substituents, were demonstrated for the first time to enable both synthesis and recycling of PEF.
